name: Mahjong Solitaire Master Game
description:
Mahjong is a classic solitaire game. The goal is match the mahjong tiles in order to clean them from the board. As the player makes the combinations, new mahjong tiles are being released, all of which must be removed to win the game.

Features
+ Several Mahjongs boards
+ Three levels of difficulty: easy, medium and hard
+ Memory Game
+ You can zoom the game with your fingers, and also move the board
